alert.note: Alert for Central Middlesex County; Northern Worcester; Northwest Middlesex County; Southeast Middlesex; Southern Worcester; Western Norfolk (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...Thunderstorms with heavy downpours will impact portions of eastern Worcester, northwestern Norfolk and Middlesex Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 529 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms with heavy downpours along a line extending from near Shirley to Berlin to near Grafton. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Minor flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor nuisance flooding of typically flood prone areas. Locations impacted include... Lowell, Newton, Framingham, Waltham, Arlington, Leominster, Billerica, Marlborough, Woburn, Shrewsbury, Chelmsford, Andover, Natick, Watertown, Lexington, Dracut, Tewksbury, Needham, Milford and Wellesley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams.

area.areaDesc: Central Middlesex County; Northern Worcester; Northwest Middlesex County; Southeast Middlesex; Southern Worcester; Western Norfolk
